short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents opening of duplicate tabs, flexible rules.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prevents opening of duplicate tabs.

Whenever a domain or URL is opened that exists in another tab, you will be switched to that tab instead of opening a duplicate.

Block by domains or exact links. Whitelist domains and exact links. Block all dupes, or only what you add to your blocklist.
